entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thompson Airport 12:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -34.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
